Sonic_Siphon.help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.targetHelp: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.
Sonic_Siphon.victimHit: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.

Sonic_Barrier.help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Barrier.targetHelp: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
Sonic_Barrier.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Barrier.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Haven.help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Havens on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Barrier. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Sonic_Haven.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)
Sonic_Haven.targetHelp: The Sonic Haven has increased your resistances to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage.
Sonic_Haven.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Haven.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Cage.help: Encases the target in an impenetrable field of sonic waves. The target cannot attack or be attacked. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic_Cage.targetHelp: You have been enveloped in a Sonic Cage. You cannot be harmed, but you can only use powers which affect you.

Disruption_Field.help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
Disruption_Field.targetHelp: The Disruption Field creates an area around a target ally which reduces the Resistance of all foes near them.

Sonic_Dispersion.help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All DMG except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.targetHelp: The Sonic Dispersion field is granting you Resistance to all types of damage, except psionic, as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.targetShortHelp: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Sonic_Repulsion.help: You create a powerful sonic resonance around an ally, repelling all foes nearby. You will lose endurance for each target repelled. Recharge: Moderate
Sonic_Repulsion.shortHelp: Toggle: Ranged (Target Ally AoE), Foe Knockback
Sonic_Repulsion.targetHelp: A sonic resonance envelops you, repelling all foes who attempt to get near you.
Sonic_Repulsion.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage potential of all nearby foes.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knocked {PlayerDest} from their feet with your {PowerName} attack!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you from your feet with their {PowerName} attack!

Clarity.help: By bouncing a carefully pitched sound wave off an ally's ear drum, you can free him from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confusion, Fear, and Immobilize effects, and leave them resistant to such effects for a good while. Protection will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Clarity also provides your ally's enhanced perception. Recharge: Fast
Clarity.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Fear, Confusion), +Perception
Clarity.targetHelp: The soothing waves of sound clear your mind of all Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and improves your perception.
Clarity.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Immobilize effects and improve his Perception.
Clarity.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear, Confuse and Immobilize effects and improves your perception.

Liquefy.help: You unleash a barrage of sonic waves on the Earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake. Most foes that pass through the location will fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and Defense. Recharge: Slow
Liquefy.shortHelp: Ranged (Location AoE), Foe Knockback, Hold, -To Hit, -DEF
Liquefy.targetHelp: The ground beneath you has been liquefied! You are stuck in sludge and taking minor damage. Your chance to hit Defense and movement rates are reduced.
